name: Development of a New Independent Steering Mechanism and AGV Module Using It
description: As logistics, which supports our daily lives, faces increasing pressure as seen in the Logistics 2024 Problem, the AGV equipped with a high-speed, highly maneuverable independent steering mechanism being developed in this project is expected to contribute to the efficiency of logistics. The design incorporates innovations such as topology optimization and modular design.
